explains: adj. 二维的；缺乏深度的
wordGroup: two-dimensional array 二维阵列；二维数组

sentences.en: All the views shown above are two-dimensional.
sentences.cn: 上面所示的所有视图都是二维的。

sentences.en: Until now, this technique could only be used to manufacture two-dimensional objects.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，该技术还只能用于构建二维的结构。

sentences.en: By adding texture, you can produce more interesting effects like marbling or wrapping a two-dimensional image around your object.
sentences.cn: 通过添加纹理，你可以制作出更有趣的效果，如大理石纹饰或者把二维的图像包裹在你的对象上。
